GenAIRR.alleles package

Submodules

GenAIRR.alleles.allele module

class GenAIRR.alleles.allele.Allele(name, gapped_sequence, length)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for alleles.

This class provides a template for alleles, defining common properties and methods that all allele types share.

name

The name of the allele.

Type:

str

length

The length of the gapped sequence.

Type:

int

gapped_sequence

The gapped nucleotide sequence of the allele.

Type:

str

ungapped_seq

The ungapped nucleotide sequence derived from the gapped sequence.

Type:

str

ungapped_len

The length of the ungapped sequence.

Type:

int

family

The gene family derived from the allele name.

Type:

str

gene

The gene name derived from the allele name.

Type:

str

anchor

The anchor position within the sequence, specific to allele type.

Type:

int

abstract get_trimmed(trim_dict)[source]

Returns the trimmed sequence along with the trim lengths.

This method must be implemented by subclasses to apply allele-specific trimming and return the result.

Parameters:

trim_dict (dict) -- A dictionary specifying trimming lengths for the allele.

Returns:

The trimmed sequence, and the trim lengths at the 5' and 3' ends, respectively.

Return type:

tuple

class GenAIRR.alleles.allele.AlleleTypes(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: Enum

Enumeration for allele types.

V

Represents the V allele type.

D

Represents the D allele type.

J

Represents the J allele type.

D = 2
J = 3
V = 1
class GenAIRR.alleles.allele.DAllele(name, gapped_sequence, length)[source]

Bases: Allele

Represents a D allele with specific trimming and analysis behaviors.

This class extends the Allele base class, providing implementations for D allele-specific methods.

type

The type of the allele, fixed to AlleleTypes.D for D alleles.

Type:

AlleleTypes

get_trimmed(trim_dict)[source]

Returns the trimmed sequence of the D allele along with the 5' and 3' trim lengths.

Parameters:

trim_dict (dict) -- A dictionary specifying trimming lengths for the D allele.

Returns:

The trimmed sequence, and the trim lengths at the 5' and 3' ends, respectively.

Return type:

tuple

type = 2

Returns:
